title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Ollama. npm install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models. Exposes chat, embed, and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface). Runs in Docker or npm dev.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java / Kotlin client for Ollama. Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama HTTP API. gem install ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community CLI helper with fzf model picker and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama completions into channels or DMs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop GUI for macOS/Linux/Windows.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async HTTP and streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting chat, completion and embeddings. NuGet package.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot using Socket-Mode to chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama REST API. Pub.dev package.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-backed AI commands to notes.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama with tokio and streaming support. crates.io/ollama-rs.
